mapper.insert: INSERT INTO NOTICE (NUM, TITLE, CONTENTS, WRITER) VALUES (NOTICE_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{title}, #{contents}, #{writer})
mapper.update: UPDATE NOTICE SET TITLE=#{title}, CONTENTS=#{contents} WHERE NUM=#{num}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM R, NT.* FROM (SELECT * FROM NOTICE ORDER BY NUM DESC) NT)
